name: Slime-san: Superslime Edition
description: Slime-san was minding his own business when suddenly… A giant worm appeared and gobbled him up! Deep within the worm’s belly, Slime-san has to face a decision: Be digested by the incoming wall of stomach acid... Or jump, slide and slime his way through the worm and back out its mouth!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP: Service pack 3 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
